00021 class TChangeNotifier: public istd::TPointerBase<Changeable>
00022 {
00023 public:
00024        typedef istd::TPointerBase<Changeable> BaseClass;
00025 
00026        explicit TChangeNotifier(Changeable* changeablePtr, int changeFlags = IChangeable::CF_MODEL, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr = NULL);
00027        virtual  ~TChangeNotifier();

00061 
00062 template <class Changeable>
00063 TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::TChangeNotifier(Changeable* changeablePtr, int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr)
00064 :      BaseClass(changeablePtr),
00065        m_changeFlags(changeFlags),
00066        m_updateParamsPtr(updateParamsPtr)
00067 {
00068        if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00069               changeablePtr->BeginChanges(m_changeFlags, m_updateParamsPtr);
00070        }
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 template <class Changeable>
00075 TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::~TChangeNotifier()
00076 {
00077        Reset();
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 template <class Changeable>
00082 void TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::SetPtr(Changeable* changeablePtr)
00083 {
00084        if (changeablePtr != BaseClass::GetPtr()){
00085               Reset();
00086 
00087               BaseClass::SetPtr(changeablePtr);
00088 
00089               if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00090                      changeablePtr->BeginChanges(m_changeFlags, m_updateParamsPtr);
00091               }
00092        }
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 template <class Changeable>
00097 inline void TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::Reset()
00098 {
00099        Changeable* changeablePtr = BaseClass::GetPtr();
00100 
00101        if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00102               changeablePtr->EndChanges(m_changeFlags, m_updateParamsPtr);
00103 
00104               BaseClass::Reset();
00105        }
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 template <class Changeable>
00110 inline void TChangeNotifier<Changeable>::Abort()
00111 {
00112        Changeable* changeablePtr = BaseClass::GetPtr();
00113 
00114        if (changeablePtr != NULL){
00115               changeablePtr->EndChanges(m_changeFlags | IChangeable::CF_ABORTED, m_updateParamsPtr);
00116 
00117               BaseClass::Reset();
00118        }
00119 }
